nodes.text: This assassin droid was created prior to or during 29 BBY, and its model was prone to killing their makers. This droid killed one female individual who was involved in the models design due to flaws in the model. This droid would later have its verbobrain destroyed by security droids, and would be placed in the personal museum of Raith Sienar, an engineer in the final years of the Galactic Republic who had attended the Rigovian Technical University with the female involved in the models design, as a reminder to not overstep one's competence.
This droid was first mentioned in Greg Bear's Rogue Planet, a novel released in May 2000.
